input.sentences: here is the beginning of the annual town beach party .
the cummunity loves to take part in the tag of war game .
the crowd this year is larger then ever and everyone is cheering for their favorite team .
look even the dogs are getting in on the game .
with all the game playing it is now time to do my favorite game and that is eating .
output.sentences: Hey look, dude, we're the first ones here!
The girls think they can win tug-o-war?
Well, they sure have enough folks routing for them.
Looks like the guys might take 'em, though.
And when it was all over, everyone ate.
